${ModID}:ScatterNails.NAME: Scatter Nails
${ModID}:ScatterNails.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of their turn, they lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:JackInABox.NAME: Jack-in-a-Box
${ModID}:JackInABox.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Whirl.NAME: Whirl
${ModID}:Whirl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Draw !M! card.

${ModID}:LetRip.NAME: Let 'er Rip
${ModID}:LetRip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards.

${ModID}:LostCog.NAME: Lost Cog
${ModID}:LostCog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card you played this combat ${ModID}:Spun, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:Blurrier.NAME: Blurrier
${ModID}:Blurrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain !B! Block again.

${ModID}:BoostedBlow.NAME: Boosted Blow
${ModID}:BoostedBlow.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Let_Go: Deal damage equal to !M! times charge spent.

${ModID}:ExtendoGrip.NAME: Extendo Grip
${ModID}:ExtendoGrip.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!.

${ModID}:Gyroscope.NAME: Gyroscope
${ModID}:Gyroscope.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! to deal !D! damage to a random enemy and Retain this.

${ModID}:Advance.NAME: Advance
${ModID}:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain [E] and an *Advance. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Advance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain [E] and an *Advance+. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Inertia.NAME: Inertia
${ModID}:Inertia.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Wind_Up, you have !M! additional Strength until you next ${ModID}:Spin. NL ${ModID}:Wind_Up !${ModID}:m2!.

${ModID}:DangerousDeterrent.NAME: Dangerous Deterrent
${ModID}:DangerousDeterrent.DESCRIPTION: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP. NL Gain !M! *Spinners. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Spinner.NAME: Spinner
${ModID}:Spinner.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and increase this damage by !M!.

${ModID}:GatherParts.NAME: Gather Parts
${ModID}:GatherParts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal, heal !M! HP and Exhaust.

${ModID}:FlyingCogs.NAME: Flying Cogs
${ModID}:FlyingCogs.DESCRIPTION: Activate and discard all ${ModID}:Parts in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each card discarded.

${ModID}:Rewinder.NAME: Rewinder
${ModID}:Rewinder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable ${ModID}:Part: NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! to Retain this and another card.

${ModID}:Efficiency.NAME: Efficiency
${ModID}:Efficiency.DESCRIPTION: When ${ModID}:Parts are activated, activate them an additional time.

${ModID}:GreasedCogs.NAME: Greased Cogs
${ModID}:GreasedCogs.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, ${ModID}:Winding_Up provides twice as much charge.
${ModID}:GreasedCogs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, ${ModID}:Winding_Up provides thrice as much charge.

${ModID}:AsFarAsItGoes.NAME: As Far as it Goes
${ModID}:AsFarAsItGoes.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!X + your Strength. NL If X is at least 2, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:Reassemble.NAME: Reassemble
${ModID}:Reassemble.DESCRIPTION: Put ALL ${ModID}:Parts from your discard pile into your hand.
${ModID}:Reassemble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put ALL ${ModID}:Parts from your draw and discard piles into your hand.

${ModID}:RotationalChaos.NAME: Rotational Chaos
${ModID}:RotationalChaos.DESCRIPTION: Repeat !M! times: NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Mesmerise.NAME: Mesmerise
${ModID}:Mesmerise.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Dizzy to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShinyCog.NAME: Shiny Cog
${ModID}:ShinyCog.DESCRIPTION: If you have played a *Ghostly *Cog this combat, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GhostlyCog.NAME: Ghostly Cog
${ModID}:GhostlyCog.DESCRIPTION: If you have played a *Shiny *Cog this combat, gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Acog.NAME: ACOG
${ModID}:Acog.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, your next attack deals double damage.
${ModID}:Acog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals double damage.

${ModID}:PotentialEnergy.NAME: Potential Energy
${ModID}:PotentialEnergy.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! charge you have, ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! to gain [E].

${ModID}:ManyMovements.NAME: Many Movements
${ModID}:ManyMovements.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s! for each: NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw !${ModID}:m2! card.

${ModID}:WearAndTear.NAME: Wear and Tear
${ModID}:WearAndTear.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the amount ${ModID}:Wound_Up this combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:WearAndTear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal damage equal to the amount ${ModID}:Wound_Up this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RecursionMechanism.NAME: Recursion Mechanism
${ModID}:RecursionMechanism.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal damage equal to !M! times the turn number. Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Part: Deal damage to a random enemy equal to the turn number.

${ModID}:Reinforce.NAME: Reinforce
${ModID}:Reinforce.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Let_Go: Gain 1 Plated Armor per !M! charge spent. Exhaust.

${ModID}:PeepTheHaul.NAME: Peep the haul!
${ModID}:PeepTheHaul.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you have no ${ModID}:Batteries, gain a ${ModID}:Battery.
${ModID}:PeepTheHaul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a ${ModID}:Battery. At the start of your turn, if you have no ${ModID}:Batteries, gain a ${ModID}:Battery.

${ModID}:PerpetualForm.NAME: Perpetual Form
${ModID}:PerpetualForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose [ENERGY]. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Cogwheels. Cards can now be played with ${ModID}:Charge ( !${ModID}:m2! ${ModID}:Charge per [E] ).

${ModID}:MachinicModification.NAME: Machinic Modification
${ModID}:MachinicModification.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Permanently give it ${ModID}:Wind_Up !M!. NL Fleeting.

${ModID}:Rearrange.NAME: Tinker
${ModID}:Rearrange.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Attune all cards in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Teddy.NAME: Teddy
${ModID}:Teddy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be ${ModID}:Attuned at campfires any number of times.

${ModID}:HastySweep.NAME: Hasty Sweep
${ModID}:HastySweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Unless you ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Gain !M! Weak.

${ModID}:SwiftStomps.NAME: Swift Stomps
${ModID}:SwiftStomps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Spin !${ModID}:s!: Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:RearrangeAttack.NAME: Rearrange
${ModID}:RearrangeAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Swap the positions of a card in your discard pile and a card in your draw pile.
